intro.text: MOD: Welcome to Echo City. BoB’s Content Quarantine muted the feed. We smuggle laughter back—one district at a time.

intro2.text: MOD: You’re the Courier for the Memetic Underground. Recover Archive fragments and light the map back up.

controlsTip.text: WASD move • Shift sprint • Ctrl crouch • Space jump • R reload. Headshots hit harder.

firstWave.text: MOD: Patrol drones first. Keep moving, pick your shots. Combo feeds color—and power.

act1_brief.text: MOD: Act I—Wake the Feed. Hold hype to re‑saturate the block. The crowd is watching.

bossIncoming.text: MOD: Crackdown unit on scope. Boss signature inbound—prep ammo and space.

midRun.text: GLITCHCAT: Telemetry’s clean. Patterns ramping. Keep the rhythm; joy follows.

lateRun.text: MOD: Deep in now. Elites deploying. Prioritize targets; use cover between pushes.

lowHp.text: Critical health! Break line of sight and use cover or medkits.

firstMed.text: Medkit collected. Stay mobile and top up when safe.

boss_5_start.text: Broodmaker spawns incoming. Eliminate pods to thin the swarm.

boss_5_down.text: MOD: Broodmaker down. Swarm quieting. Scoop supplies and reset your lane.

boss_5_report.text: MOD: Uplink clean. The block’s laughing again. BoB will counter—eyes up.

boss_10_start.text: MOD: Commissioner Sanitizer’s spire team online. Area denial and beams—strafe clean.

boss_10_down.text: MOD: Sanitizer silenced. Broadcast reached the block. Armory channels are opening.

boss_15_start.text: MOD: Influencer Militia Captain with Ad Zeppelin support. Cancel sponsorship pods to break the shield.

boss_15_down.text: MOD: Captain dropped. Formation broken; sponsors ghosted.

boss_20_start.text: GLITCHCAT: Algorithm Shard Avatar manifesting. Watch emissive tells; play off‑beat.

boss_20_down.text: GLITCHCAT: Shard reconciled. Signal variance restored.

boss_25_start.text: Broodmaker returns, reinforced. Spread the damage, clear eggs fast.

boss_25_down.text: Heavy Broodmaker down. You are becoming the problem.

boss_30_start.text: Hydraclone detected. Eliminate clones quickly to prevent overwhelming numbers.

boss_30_down.text: Hydraclone neutralized. The field quiets—for now.

boss_35_start.text: Strike Adjudicator enters. Expect precision strikes and punish windows—stay moving.

boss_35_down.text: Adjudicator down. You have exceeded projections.
